# Word Synonyms

.pull-left[

- abrupt = sudden, hasty, unexpected

- adamant = studborn, inflexible

- adhere = comply, observe

- audacity = boldness, courage

- captivity = imprisonment, confinement

- decipher = interpret, reveal 

- deliberate = planned, intentional 

- despair = hopelessness, anguish

- disastrous = terrible, devastating




]

.pull-right[

- dwell = reside, inhabit, live

- eccentric = strange, abnormal

- eloquence = expression, fluency 

- enlighten = disclose, illuminate

- escalate = heighten, intensify

- feeble = weak, frail

- fragile = breakable, delicate

- grudge = hatred, aversion

- guile = cunning, deceit

- haughty = arrogance, pompous

- immaculate = clean, spotless

]
